original_title: 《原神》线上音乐会2021———「无际之旅的旋律」
overview: Talented musicians from around the world, including Belgium, South Korea, and the United States, will showcase the unique charm of symphonic, pop and a cappella music, respectively, with their renditions of the melodious Genshin Impact soundtrack.
title: Genshin Concert 2021: Melodies of an Endless Journey
